Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Montrose
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via: Kimball, Lawrence, Kedzie, Montrose and Kimball, due to, street blockage, near Kimball/Montrose.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Kimball, Lawrence, Kedzie, Montrose and Kimball, due to, street blockage, near Kimball/Montrose.

Allow extra travel time.
